name: World Engineers Summit – Applied Energy Symposium & Forum
content: Come July 2017, Singapore will host the World Engineers Summit – Applied Energy Symposium & Forum: Low Carbon Cities & Urban Energy Joint Conference (WES-CUE) 2017\. Packed with rich technical content, the third biennial conference will feature eminent experts as keynote speakers and renowned researchers, practitioners and policy makers showcasing the latest research findings and engineering innovations in support of a low carbon future and sustainable development. Event Details: Date & Time: 18 July 2017, 9am – 6pm 19 July 2017, 9am – 6pm 20 July 2017, 9am – 10pm 21 July 2017, 9am – 5pm Fee: Please contact Veron Poh - veron.poh@iesnet.org.sg Venue: Suntec Singapore Convention and Exhibition Centre 1 Raffles Boulevard Suntec City Singapore 039593 Organiser: The Institution of Engineers, Singapore Tel: +65 6461 1240 Event Links: http://www.wes-ies.org/ Register: http://www.wes-ies.org/registration/ Event type: Conference, Exhibition, Seminar, Symposium
